ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Brown meatballs in batches over medium-high heat before adding sauce
Whisk sour cream into mushroom soup off heat to prevent curdling
This creamy sauce is perfect served over egg noodles or rice
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through creating a silky mushroom-sour cream sauce that clings to tender meatballs without breaking.
